name: Heathen Engineering's Terran
description: Galactic Strategy | Tactics | Action! Found an empire and expand across the stars, command massive fleets in interstellar conflicts and pilot powerful warships as you battle for victory in Heathen Engineering’s Terran.
minimum_requirements: 最低配置: 操作系统: Windows 7+ 处理器: Core 2 Duo Processor or Equivalent 内存: 8 GB RAM 图形: Shader Model 4 capabilities DirectX 版本: 10 存储空间: 需要 6 GB 可用空间
